label: A2B4C_oF56_70_e_h_a-001
title: Thenardite [Na$_{2}$SO$_{4}$ (V), $H1_{7}$] Structure
comments: Na$_{2}$SO$_{4}$ has eight known anhydrous phases.  The thenardite phase is ``reported to be stable between 32$^\circ$C and about 180$^\circ$C'' (Nord, 1973), however the data reported here was taken on synthetic thenardite at 25$^\circ$C.
